events.message: I received the laptop yesterday, but the screen has a noticeable scratch and it seems faulty.
The reported issue was identified as a product defect due to damage and faulty screen.
Support agent Jamie has been assigned to handle the case regarding the damaged laptop screen.
Hello! I'm Jamie from support. Sorry to hear about the issue with your laptop screen. Let's get this sorted out quickly.
Could you please provide photos of the scratch and let me know if the device is otherwise working fine?
I've attached the photos showing the scratch clearly. The screen flickers sometimes, so itâ€™s not working properly.
Thanks for the photos. We can offer you a replacement unit or a full refund given the defect. Please let us know your preference.
I would prefer a replacement unit since I still want the laptop but need a working screen.
We have arranged a replacement laptop shipment for you. You will receive tracking details shortly.
Just checking in to confirm that you received the replacement laptop and that everything is functioning well now.
Yes, I received the replacement yesterday and everything is working perfectly. Thanks for the quick help!
Glad to hear the replacement is working well. Closing the case now, and feel free to contact us anytime.
